title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-2.4 - Responsibilities of the approved laboratory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-2.4 - Responsibilities of the approved laboratory

State Regulations

The approved laboratory shall report any positive results from cord, newborn, or mother's blood to the responsible physician or birth attendant and local health unit within 24 hours of completion of testing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
69-2.4

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
